CustomField.formula: TEXT( FLOOR( DateReceptionCourrier__c - CreatedDate ) ) & " Days " & TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( DateReceptionCourrier__c - CreatedDate )*24,24)) ) &" Hours " & TEXT( ROUND(MOD(( DateReceptionCourrier__c - CreatedDate )*1440,60),0) ) &" Minutes "
